RevHub.releaseNotes:
# Driver Hub OS Changelog
## 0.0.4 (2020-02-22)
* Shows app labels in launcher when in landscape mode, and reduces home screen grid to 4x3 (from 4x4)
* Shows Driver Hub OS version in the Settings app
* Shows explanation of how to exit immersive mode the first time that the Driver Station app is launched
* Adds support for the Etpark controller in PS4 mode
* Adds WifiLog.txt log file
* Adds Text to Speech support (may switch to a better voice in the future)
* Fixes issue where the Driver Station app would not auto-launch if the screen lock was set to "None"
* Fixes issue where the screenshot button would not show up in the navigation bar even if it was enabled in the Settings app

## 0.0.3 (2020-02-05)
* Makes lots of tweaks and fixes to the power management code
* Auto-grants runtime permissions to pre-installed DS app
* Auto-launches DS app on boot (by default)
* Removes letters from lockscreen PIN keypad
* Improves behavior of the Display Size setting
* Enables [Doze mode](https://developer.android.com/training/monitoring-device-state/doze-standby) to improve standby times
* Increases default volume
* Shows battery percentage in status bar by default

## 0.0.2 (2020-01-08)
* Allows the device to be used with the ports facing downwards
* Fixes issue where time updates would not be written to the real-time clock due to insufficient permissions
